rule: The response must not include more than one word under any circumstances.
input: sentence: Hurry, grab it now., word: grab
validityText:
The input consists of a sentence "Hurry, grab it now." and a word "grab". The sentence is a grammatically valid string containing multiple words. The sentence contains a comma and a period which are considered punctuation. The word "grab" is a substring of the sentence "Hurry, grab it now.". The word "grab" does not include punctuation. All rules in the input specification are met.
OK
